form.heading: Report a Text Scam
form.subheading: Help protect Filipinos by reporting malicious SMS.
form.success: Maraming Salamat! Your report has been added to the national threat feed.

edu.what_desc: Smishing (SMS Phishing) is a scam where fraudsters send text messages pretending to be from legitimate organizations (like GCash, Maya, or banks) to trick you into clicking malicious links.
edu.how_desc:
1. Do not click the link!
2. Copy the exact text message.
3. Paste it here to warn others.

feed.title: Live Threat Feed
feed.desc: Real-time list of malicious URLs and numbers reported by the community.
